original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary:
"Trump's Special Envoy Hails Alaska Summit with Putin as Historic Step Toward Peace in Ukraine"

"US President Donald Trump's meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska is seen as a significant step towards resolving the Ukraine conflict, according to Trump's special envoy Keith Kellogg. Kellogg criticized the summit's critics and emphasized Trump's diplomatic approach to the conflict, contrasting it with his predecessor Joe Biden's."</s>
